summary: Come and download this unique Dagger from your Dreams.
descriptionHtml:
[SIZE=1]my other mod :3 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47885/?[/SIZE]

[CENTER][IMG]http://picload.org/image/ldppgdo/screenshot002.png[/IMG][/CENTER]

[youtube]Jrz5aWOSrHE[/youtube]
[youtube]oWCvGYsc6o8[/youtube] [youtube]UChZp_w4XPE[/youtube]

[CENTER][IMG]http://holybibletext.com/divider.png[/IMG][/CENTER]

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Description:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

So here i share my custom made Dagger Alduins Claw which i believe is the best damn looking weapon i made so far. :3

At the moment you can only download a craftable Version(DAEDRIC CATEGORY) you will need the following things to be able to craft it... oh and for you who just wanna see it ingame or dont wanna bother with crafting there is one in feandals house i heard...

[SIZE=1](Daedric Smithing Perk obviously) :3[/SIZE]
4 Steel Ingots
4 Leather Strips
2 Gold Ingots
1 Deadra heart
3 Ebony ingots


[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Install:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

1.Extract the archive
2.Copy the contents of the archive in your SkyrimData folder
3.Open the Skyrim launcher or your mod manager of choice and check the Alduins Fang.esp

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Uninstall:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

1.Uncheck the esp plugin
2.Delete all files that came with the mod


[CENTER][IMG]http://holybibletext.com/divider.png[/IMG][/CENTER]


Do NOT modify/reupload/edit/sell any asset in this mod without my permission. Have fun!
author: standalone09
